item.title: Dot/Nix(OS)
item.description: 1 snippets # 1# . "$HOME/.nix-profile/etc/profile.d/hm-session-vars.sh" 2. "/etc/profiles/per-user/$USER/etc/profile.d/hm-session-vars.sh" Code Snippet 1: shell에서 home-manager 사용하기 2 .profile # 1<<shell에서 home-manager 사용하기>> 3 .zshrc # 1export PATH=~/bin:~/.emacs.d/bin:~/.npm-global/bin:$PATH 2 3# export NIX_PATH=$HOME/.nix-defexpr/channels${NIX_PATH:+:}$NIX_PATH 4export NIX_PATH=$HOME/.nix-defexpr/channels:/nix/var/nix/profiles/per-user/root/channels${NIX_PATH:+:$NIX_PATH} 5 6&l
